name: BostonTBlueLineFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: As part of your Flash Briefing, hear the latest alerts on the MBTA Blue Line service. The skill uses the MBTA open developer alert feed and will read back all relevant alerts to the Blue Line and let you know when the alert was last posted. This is an open source project where the code can be found at https://github.com/rschwager/alexa-mbta-flashfeed. Content is generated by the MBTA.
